quote: There are many challenges I face while working on a book. Working within deadlines and schedules is certainly one of the bigger ones for me. I want to create the best possible book I can for my readers with words and pictures - and that takes time to get it just right.

I don't believe in deadlines, I don't believe in telling the enemy when we're going to withdraw.

I love deadlines. I like the whooshing sound they make as they fly by.
